title: How to balance the game entirely in one go . ( no joke )
body:
The problem in the game is the champion without mana . You got rid of mana potion but it was a indirect buff to all manaless champion . Put mana cost to all champion and now we gonna have a fair game where everyone suffer of mana issue by some time .  

http://i.imgur.com/9gzOqZs.pnghttp://i.imgur.com/9gzOqZs.png

replies.body: i like my manaless champions tho, granted alot of them are annoying to lane against but they are manageable
You saying rumble should build mana? AND BE TANKY? What??
It just forces players to be smarter with their mana usage. Though not being given a good example makes it harder to figure where to go with this.
